projects.title: SAVIA - Smart Water Monitoring
projects.shortDescription: IoT-based water quality monitoring system with real-time dashboard.
projects.description: SAVIA is an innovative IoT solution designed to monitor water quality in real-time. The system uses multiple sensors to track pH levels, turbidity, temperature, and other critical parameters, sending data to a web-based dashboard for analysis.

projects.title: Harmony-IoT
projects.shortDescription: Smart home automation system recognized in Innovillage Top 50.
projects.description: Harmony-IoT is a comprehensive smart home solution that integrates various IoT devices for seamless home automation. The project was recognized as one of the Top 50 innovations in the Innovillage competition.

projects.title: Blood Type Detector
projects.shortDescription: Automated blood type detection system for community health programs.
projects.description: A community service project developing an automated blood type detection system to assist healthcare providers in rural areas. The device uses image processing to identify blood types quickly and accurately.
